ChestBehindHead.name: Behind Head Chest Stretch
ChestBehindHead.execution: Pull elbows back further behind ears. Hold stretch.
ChestBehindHead.comments: Hands may be clasped. Keep head upright.

ChestStraightArm.name: Straight Arm Chest Stretch
ChestStraightArm.preparation: With arm extended, position hand on fixed structure shoulder height.
ChestStraightArm.execution: Turn body away from positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
ChestStraightArm.comments: Upper chest becomes more stretched with elbow lower. Lower chest and pectoralis minor become more stretched with elbow higher.

ChestDoorway.name: Doorway Chest Stretch
ChestDoorway.preparation: Stand at end of wall or in doorway facing perpendicular to wall. Place inside of bent arm on surface of wall. Position bent elbow shoulder height.
ChestDoorway.execution: Turn body away from positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
ChestDoorway.comments: Upper chest becomes more stretched with elbow lower. Lower chest and pectoralis minor become more stretched with elbow higher.

ChestPNFChestBehindHead.name: PNF Behind Head Chest Stretch
ChestPNFChestBehindHead.preparation: Instruct participant to sit on floor or bench and place hands behind head, facing forward. Stand behind participant and position leg behind their head. Place hands on participants elbows.
ChestPNFChestBehindHead.execution: Pull participants elbows back. Hold stretch.
ChestPNFChestBehindHead.comments: Participants hands can be clasped. See PNF stretch techniques. Also see Behind Head Chest Stretch for similar static stretch.
